member.name: T:quotable.core.RandomQuoteProvider
member.summary: Defines the interface for a class that returns a specified number of random quotes.

member.name: M:quotable.core.RandomQuoteProvider.GetRandomQuotes(System.Int64)
member.summary: Returns a random sequence of quotes.
member.param: The number of quotes that should be returned.
member.returns: A sequence of quotes whose length is at most numberOfQuotes in length.
member.remarks: If the source of quotes does not have enough quotes to satisfy the requests, it is acceptable to return fewer.
